sections.heading: Amendments to plat9-476.Amendments to platIf on the hearing it is determined by the board that corrections, additions or amendments in any respect shall be made to the plat or map then a plat or map shall be prepared by the owner in accordance with the amendments, corrections or additions, and the c
sections.text: Amendments to plat9-476.Amendments to platIf on the hearing it is determined by the board that corrections, additions or amendments in any respect shall be made to the plat or map then a plat or map shall be prepared by the owner in accordance with the amendments, corrections or additions, and the consent of the owner and the board shall be endorsed thereon and filed with the county recorder.
